    @Target({ElementType.TYPE})
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
@Documented
@Component
public @interface Repository {
    @AliasFor(
        annotation = Component.class
    )
    String value() default "";
}

    @Configuration
public class Config() {

    @Bean
    public Gunnu gunnu() {
        return new Gunnu();
    }
}
